CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests XHR network resource type and size for asynchronous requests when "blob" is specified as the response type.

http://127.0.0.1:8000/devtools/network/resources/resource.php
resource.type: xhr
resource.size: 11
resource.content after requesting content: Hello world
